B54F3AE74FE03F1200AD098F5312D7A6: Disables the device on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
650644994C28CFD38E31829A56E3464F: Enables the device on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
1104ABBC4616CFE4BFFDC8BCD475B503: Spawns a crowd to cheer you on.
2253A34C49B07B7CD62CB18E4F691187: Spawns a crowd to cheer you on.
F4DA79224C576591D48AF68C10A6FD46: Spawns a crowd to cheer you on.
7EDB5C9C49AC528E948643B2245928A7: This device allows you to set up a crowd

UserOptionDefinition.BP_CrowdVolume_Device_C.EnabledDuringPha: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. Pre-Game includes all phases prior to the Game starting (the waiting for players lobby on Featured Islands and the Game Start Countdown).
UserOptionDefinition.BP_CrowdVolume_Device_C.Disable.Descript: Disables the device on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
UserOptionDefinition.BP_CrowdVolume_Device_C.Enable.Descripti: Enables the device on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
UserOptionDefinition.BP_CrowdVolume_Device_C.CrowdDensity.Des: Sets how densely packed the crowd is.
UserOptionDefinition.BP_CrowdVolume_Device_C.CharacterAlignme: Sets how precisely crowd members are aligned on a grid.
UserOptionDefinition.BP_CrowdVolume_Device_C.CharacterScaleRa: Sets the amount of randomness in the size of crowd members.
UserOptionDefinition.BP_CrowdVolume_Device_C.CharacterAngleRa: Sets the amount of randomness in which way the crowd members are facing.
UserOptionDefinition.BP_CrowdVolume_Device_C.ZoneDepth.Descri: Sets the depth of the zone in tiles.
UserOptionDefinition.BP_CrowdVolume_Device_C.ZoneHeight.Descr: Sets the height of the zone in tiles.
UserOptionDefinition.BP_CrowdVolume_Device_C.ZoneWidth.Descri: Sets the width of the zone in tiles.
